column3:
School is out for the summer.  Jake and Jimmy are playing on a baseball team. They are
ewlineboth nine years old this year.  Their team is called the Knights.  Jake plays first base
ewlineand Jimmy is a pitcher.  They both love baseball.  They started playing when they were
ewlinefour years old.  It is so fun for them.  Their team has won three games so far.  They beat
ewlinethe Jets, the Bluejays, and the Hawks so far.  They have not lost any games yet.  They are
ewlineplaying the Tigers today.  The Tigers have not lost any games either.  The score was one
ewlineto one until the last inning.  There were two outs.  Jimmy came to the plate.  The pitcher
ewlinenamed Johnny threw the ball hard.  Jimmy swung his bat too late and missed.  He missed the
ewlinenext pitch too.  It was too fast.  He was ready for the next pitch.  He hit it hard to
ewlinecenter field.  The Tiger player in center field jumped to catch it, but it went over his
ewlinehead and over the fence.  It was a home run!  The Knights won the game!
column4: multiple: Who hit a home run at the end of the game?
column9: multiple: What team are the Knights playing today?
column19: multiple: How old were the boys when they started playing baseball?
